biotools.summary:
Inexpensive robotic system for standard and fluorescent imaging of protein crystals.

Code and .obj files for construction of a fluorescent robotic imager used for protein crystallography.

Code and .obj files for construction of a robotic imager capable of using visible fluorescence to automatically image plates from protein crystallization experiments.

bioschemas.name: Fluorescent Robotic Imager
